sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ yī bēi shuǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez me donner un verre d'eau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please give me a glass of water.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il faut se laver les mains avant de manger.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should wash your hands before eating.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le livre est sur la table.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The book is on top of the table.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ces pommes-là sont très sucrées.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Those apples are very sweet.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Y a-t-il quelqu'un à la maison ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Is anyone home?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez fermer la porte.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please close the door.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ huì chàng zhè shǒu gē ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Sais-tu chanter cette chanson ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Can you sing this song?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je t'attends à l'entrée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'm waiting for you at the doorway.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je finis le travail à six heures.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I finish work at six o'clock.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je ne travaille pas le dimanche.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I don't work on Sunday.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān shì jǐ yuè jǐ hào?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quelle est la date d'aujourd'hui ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What is today's date?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ xiān zǒu ba, wǒ děng yīxià.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Pars d'abord, je vais attendre un peu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You go first, I'll wait a bit.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měitiān xǐ liǎng cì liǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je me lave le visage deux fois par jour.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I wash my face twice a day.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allons au parc.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's go to the park.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What's the matter?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ bù chī ròu, wǒ shì sùshízhě.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je ne mange pas de viande, je suis végétarien.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I don't eat meat, I'm a vegetarian.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qiántiān wǒ qù kàn le diànyǐng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Avant-hier, je suis allé voir un film.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The day before yesterday, I went to see a movie.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì wǒmen bān dì yī míng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est le premier de notre classe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is first in our class.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xià yī zhàn wǒ yào xiàchē.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je dois descendre au prochain arrêt.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I need to get off at the next stop.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Est-ce qu'il a une petite amie ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Does he have a girlfriend?
